definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Some might argue he needs to make it tough on them.
sentences.chinese: 有人可能會辯說他需要也讓他們感到困難。

sentences.english: She contended that sheep do as much damage to the countryside as kangaroos.
sentences.chinese: 她力辯說羊對鄉村的危害和袋鼠一樣。

sentences.english: But Riedel contends there are still plenty of opportunities ahead.
sentences.chinese: 但裏德爾分辯說，中國還存在着大量的機會。

sentences.english: Other people argue that file sharing should not be illegal.
sentences.chinese: 另一些人則爭辯說文件共享不應該是非法的。

sentences.english: I would argue that it does, but I would never get anywhere with that.
sentences.chinese: 我想要同她爭辯說有，但卻從來也說不出個所以然。

sentences.english: I couldn't get my point across in the debate.
sentences.chinese: 在辯說中我沒有辦法清晰地表明本身的不雅點。

sentences.english: Its supporters have justified the space station as a terminal for the space shuttle.
sentences.chinese: 空間站的支持者曾分辯說它是航天飛機的終點站。

sentences.english: He can argue that there is a precedent.
sentences.chinese: 多迪克爭辯說曾有先例。

sentences.english: They argue that Jesus ate meat, so meat eating must be OK.
sentences.chinese: 他們爭辯說耶穌也喫肉，所以喫肉是可以的。

sentences.english: I am aware that some will argue that the fetus has an inalienable right to life.
sentences.chinese: 我很清楚一些人會爭辯說胎兒有不可剝奪的生存權。

sentences.english: Some argue that Japan is an example of a nation-state.
sentences.chinese: 有人爭辯說，日本是一個民族國家的例子。

sentences.english: Britain argued that Iran had entered the binding commercial agreement.
sentences.chinese: 英國辯說伊朗已經簽訂了約束性商業協議。

sentences.english: You could argue that the user does not need that sort of hand guiding.
sentences.chinese: 您可能會爭辯說，用戶不需要這種手把手的指導。

sentences.english: It argues the procedure is effective in reducing repeat offenses.
sentences.chinese: 他爭辯說這項實施有效地減少了重新犯罪。

sentences.english: People wiser than I would care to argue with often say that extreme emotions cannot be sustained for long.
sentences.chinese: 比我聰明的人也許會爭辯說，濃情並不能持久。
